summary: This gives Camilla a (in my opinion) better nose.
descriptionHtml:
I always thought that Camilla\'s nose looked a little brutish, like it had been broken or something. This mod gives her a much nicer, thinner nose. I married her, and now I can look at her without mistaking her for a bandit and trying to kill her. Also, can anybody help me find my daughter, Lucia? We moved to Lakeview manor, and we started playing hide and seek. She\'s good.

UPDATE: I had the ESP and BSA as two separate files, which makes the mod not work. I fixed it, it should be good to play now.
author: Nonmeatbag
